title: Wanderer
description: A soul without a home, always moving and never settling.

title: Noble
description: Born of privilege, with wealth and influence at your fingertips.
bonus: Bonus: +2 to Charisma, Access to Noble Estates.

title: Outlaw
description: A life on the edge, living by your own rules and outside the law.
bonus: Bonus: +1 to Combat Skills, Discounts on Black Market Goods.

title: Bandit
description: Living on the fringes of society, taking what you need by force.
bonus: Bonus: +1 to Combat Skills, +1 to Stealth.

title: Raised by Snake Handlers
description: Hardened by a childhood among snake handlers, you have an unnatural resilience to poisons.
